text: Penor is a small town 35 km south of Kuantan town. Located near the Kuantan- Pekan district border, it is accessible by the Tanjung Lumpur Highway (). Penor houses the jail of Pahang, Penor Jail, which is Penor's landmark. Apart from the jail, Penor is famous among locals for its calm beach and also as a fishing spot. Category:Towns in Pahang
title: Penor, Pahang
